name: shriveled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
dry, smaller than normal, and covered with lines as if by crushing or folding: Those oranges were looking old and shriveled, so I threw them out. All I had was two shriveled potatoes. a bent and shriveled old man
much smaller than is needed or wanted: They are nervously waiting to see whether their shriveled pension funds recover. See
shrivel
More examplesFewer examplesGoji berries are shriveled red berries that look like red raisins. His arms and legs are so shriveled that his head looks disproportionately large.concern about their shriveled profit margins
